abdominal_pain: Do you experience pain in your abdomen?
abnormal_menstruation: Do you have irregular or abnormal menstruation?
acidity: Do you experience acidity or heartburn?
acute_liver_failure: Have you experienced acute liver failure?
altered_sensorium: Have you experienced changes in your level of consciousness or awareness?
belly_pain: Do you have pain in your belly?
blackheads: Do you have blackheads on your skin?
bladder_discomfort: Do you experience discomfort in your bladder?
blister: Do you have blisters on your skin?
blood_in_sputum: Do you have blood in your sputum (phlegm)?
blurred_and_distorted_vision: Do you experience blurred and distorted vision?
burning_micturition: Do you experience a burning sensation when urinating?
cold_hands_and_feets: Do you have cold hands and feet?
continuous_feel_of_urine: Do you constantly feel the need to urinate?
dark_urine: Is your urine dark in color?
dischromic_patches: Do you have discolored patches on your skin?
distention_of_abdomen: Is your abdomen distended or swollen?
dizziness: Do you feel dizzy or lightheaded?
drying_and_tingling_lips: Do your lips feel dry and tingle?
enlarged_thyroid: Do you have an enlarged thyroid gland?
family_history: Is there a history of the same condition in your family?
fast_heart_rate: Do you have a fast heart rate?
fatigue: Do you often feel extremely tired?
fluid_overload: Is there an excessive amount of fluid in your body?
foul_smell_ofurine: Does your urine have a foul odor?
high_fever: Do you have a high fever?
hip_joint_pain: Do you have pain in your hip joints?
history_of_alcohol_consumption: Have you consumed alcohol in the past?
increased_appetite: Do you have an increased appetite?
indigestion: Do you have trouble digesting food?
inflammatory_nails: Do you have inflamed or swollen nails?
irregular_sugar_level: Do you have irregular blood sugar levels?
irritability: Are you easily irritated or agitated?
itching: Do you experience itching on your skin?
knee_pain: Do you have pain in your knees?
lethargy: Do you feel sluggish and lacking in energy?
loss_of_balance: Do you experience a loss of balance?
loss_of_smell: Have you lost your sense of smell?
malaise: Do you feel generally unwell or fatigued?
mild_fever: Do you have a mild fever?
movement_stiffness: Do you experience stiffness in your movements?
mucoid_sputum: Do you have thick, sticky mucus?
neck_pain: Do you have pain in your neck?
nodal_skin_eruptions: Do you have nodal eruptions on your skin?
pain_behind_the_eyes: Do you experience pain behind your eyes?
pain_during_bowel_movements: Do you experience pain during bowel movements?
pain_in_anal_region: Do you have pain in your anal region?
painful_walking: Do you experience pain while walking?
palpitations: Do you experience palpitations or rapid heartbeat?
passage_of_gases: Do you have frequent gas passage (flatulence)?
patches_in_throat: Do you have patches in your throat?
phlegm: Do you have excess phlegm in your throat?
prognosis: What is the expected outcome or forecast of your condition?
prominent_veins_on_calf: Do you have prominent veins on your calf?
puffy_face_and_eyes: Is your face and eyes puffy?
pus_filled_pimples: Do you have pimples filled with pus?
receiving_blood_transfusion: Have you received a blood transfusion?
receiving_unsterile_injections: Have you received injections that weren't properly sterilized?
red_sore_around_nose: Is there a red sore around your nose?
red_spots_over_body: Do you have red spots on your body?
restlessness: Do you feel restless or agitated?
runny_nose: Do you have a runny nose?
rusty_sputum: Is your sputum rusty in color?
scurring: Do you have flaking or scaling of the skin?
shivering: Do you shiver or shake uncontrollably?
silver_like_dusting: Do you have silver-like dusting on your skin?
sinus_pressure: Do you feel pressure in your sinuses?
skin_rash: Do you have a rash on your skin?
slurred_speech: Do you have difficulty speaking clearly?
small_dents_in_nails: Are there small dents in your nails?
spinning_movements: Do you experience spinning movements or dizziness?
spotting_urination: Do you notice spotting during urination?
stiff_neck: Is your neck stiff and hard to move?
stomach_bleeding: Have you had bleeding in your stomach?
stomach_pain: Do you have pain in your stomach?
swollen_blood_vessels: Do you have swollen blood vessels?
swollen_extremities: Are your extremities (e.g., hands, feet) swollen?
toxic_look_(typhos): Do you have a sick or toxic appearance?
ulcers_on_tongue: Do you have ulcers on your tongue?
unsteadiness: Do you feel unsteady or shaky?
visual_disturbances: Do you experience disturbances in your vision?
weakness_of_one_body_side: Do you experience weakness on one side of your body?
yellow_crust_ooze: Does a yellow crust ooze from a sore?
yellow_urine: Is your urine yellow in color?
yellowish_skin: Does your skin have a yellowish tint?
